book_description: The Land Book presents comprehensive country and thematic pages with linked open data on land governance from diverse sources around the world.
debate_description: This platform serves to stimulate debate with others in the land governance community, from hot topics like land grabbing to practical innovations in community mapping.
library_description: The Land Library will be the authoritative virtual repository of land-related information, including peer-reviewed publications, policies, maps, and multimedia content.
agriculture_employment: Employment in agriculture for countries in the region
agriculture_timeline: Timeline of employment in agriculture for
facilitated_by_the_international_land_co: Facilitated by the International Land Coalition
countries_description: The Land Book follows the classification made by the Geopolitical Ontology from the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations.
no_data: No data is currently available for the countries marked as
extended_data: Extended data is available for the countries marked as
show_only_countries: Show only countries with available data
error_message: Sorry, we can't find that page
error_description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been removed
login-description: Welcome to the Land Portal! Fill out this form to create an account. Once you submit, we will receive a notification to approve your account.
indicators_description: The Land Book indicators came from different Data Sources. If you know of any additional data source or can directly provide new data for any given country please keep in touch.
last_update_description: Last update date of the data from a given indicator is provided
create_own_data_view: Create your own Land Portal data visualisation
title: Title
copy_code: Copy and paste the following code into the HTML of your website to include the chart

motto_description_1: The leading online destination for information, resources, innovations and networking on land issues.
motto_description_2: Improving land governance and securing land rights for landlessness and vulnerable people.

no_search_results_0: Your search did not yield any result
no_search_results_1: Check if your spelling is correct, or try removing filters
no_search_results_2: Remove quotes around phrases to match each word individually: "blue drop" will match less than blue drop
no_search_results_3: You can require or exclude terms using + and -: big +blue drop will require a match on blue while big blue -drop will exclude results that contain drop
